_comment: Auto-generated Grafana dashboard for BullMQ queue metrics stored in queue_metrics table.
title: Queue Metrics â€“ BullMQ

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(recorded_at, 1m), sum(waiting) as waiting FROM queue_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(recorded_at, 1m), sum(active) as active FROM queue_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(recorded_at, 1m), sum(failed) as failed FROM queue_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(recorded_at, 1m), sum(completed) as completed FROM queue_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
